about_the_game:
The Sun Campaign features the Sun! The Sun is huge, so take multi sector conquering to your advantage! Master this campaign and earn campaign stars!

Features:

One celestial bodies:

Sun: 6x6 star

Advantages:

  • You no longer have to own the sun in your inventory to play this campaign! If you own this DLC you can keep it to yourself forever!

  • Instant unlock! No download required

  • Earn a campaign gift from this DLC! (1500 credits)

  • Master this campaign and show your pride with campaign stars!

  • Support the developer!
detailed_description:
The Sun Campaign features the Sun! The Sun is huge, so take multi sector conquering to your advantage! Master this campaign and earn campaign stars!

Features:

One celestial bodies:

Sun: 6x6 star

Advantages:

  • You no longer have to own the sun in your inventory to play this campaign! If you own this DLC you can keep it to yourself forever!

  • Instant unlock! No download required

  • Earn a campaign gift from this DLC! (1500 credits)

  • Master this campaign and show your pride with campaign stars!

  • Support the developer!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2300 Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520 (or a GPU with at least 128MB VRAM)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Absolute Minimum Specs on Lowest which should get you around 60FPS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14-24
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on highest settings without major stuttering or lag

name: Asteroids ++ | The Sun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2300 Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520 (or a GPU with at least 128MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Absolute Minimum Specs on Lowest which should get you around 60FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on highest settings without major stuttering or lag
